title: Who should get the next Boss Arcade skin?
body:
I personaly think it should be Xerath. He has a good persona for the role, but I'd like your opinions on the matter.

What do you guys think?

replies.body: I was thinking **Dungeon Boss Yorick** because of all the cool skin concepts for arcade Yorick. Also he hasn't received a new skin in years. Also there could be a mini-game just like the Blitzcrank one where you choose your champion to go against a wave of Yorick minions.

No, Xerath needs a Program skin, not a Boss skin.

Shaco should be the Twin Boss.

{{champion:268}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:60}} 

Would be neat with their little minions.

{{champion:74}}  Can also fit that role.

{{champion:223}}  Would be a VERY interesting outcome.

Secret Boss Evelynn
Always hiding in the shadows

But seriously though, an Arcade Vel'koz skin would be really cool, and he has a good personality for it
Minion Boss Malzahar, Seige Boss Ziggs, or Raid Boss Nasus would be great.
